title: Supply and Installation of Solar Panels for Municipal Buildings
description: Seeking qualified contractors to supply and install photovoltaic solar panels on multiple municipal buildings to enhance renewable energy usage and reduce carbon footprint. The project includes maintenance services for a period of 5 years.

title: Construction of New Public Library Facility
description: Invitation to tender for the construction of a modern public library, including architectural design, civil engineering, and interior fit-out. The building should meet green building standards and be accessible to all citizens.

title: Provision of Cleaning Services for Public Schools
description: Request for proposals from experienced cleaning service providers to maintain hygiene and cleanliness standards across 50 public schools. Services include daily cleaning, periodic deep cleaning, and supply of cleaning materials.

title: Supply of Ergonomic Chairs for AI Innovation Lab
description: Seeking procurement of ergonomically optimized seating solutions with adjustable lumbar support and dynamic positioning mechanisms to facilitate enhanced cognitive performance and sustained comfort metrics for artificial intelligence research personnel within our state-of-the-art facility.

title: Procurement of High-Performance GPUs for AI Computation
description: Urgent requisition for cutting-edge computational accelerators featuring tensor cores and high-bandwidth memory interfaces, specifically engineered for parallel processing of deep neural network architectures and large language model training pipelines, with minimum requirements of 80 TFLOPS FP16 performance.

title: Supply of Optimized Servers for AI Research
description: Strategic acquisition initiative for high-density compute clusters with specialized cooling solutions and interconnect fabric, optimized for distributed training of foundation models and multi-node parallel computing workflows in AI/ML research contexts.

title: Development of AI-Powered Traffic Management System
description: Request for proposals: Implementation of a sophisticated urban mobility optimization framework leveraging multi-agent reinforcement learning paradigms, computer vision analytics, and edge computing infrastructure to orchestrate real-time traffic flow dynamics through adaptive signal control mechanisms and predictive congestion management.

title: Development of Natural Language Processing Chatbot for Citizen Engagement
description: Soliciting development of an advanced conversational agent incorporating transformer-based architectures, multi-modal interaction capabilities, and emotion recognition algorithms. System must demonstrate zero-shot learning capabilities, handle code-switching scenarios, and maintain context across multiple conversation turns while adhering to strict data privacy regulations.

title: Implementation of Machine Learning Traffic Analysis System
description: Procurement notice for an intelligent transportation system utilizing ensemble methods of convolutional neural networks and spatio-temporal graph networks for real-time traffic pattern recognition, anomaly detection, and autonomous decision-making in urban traffic management scenarios.

title: Deep Learning-Based Waste Management Optimization
description: Seeking innovative waste management solution leveraging multi-objective optimization algorithms, deep reinforcement learning, and Internet of Things sensor fusion for dynamic route planning. Must incorporate weather pattern analysis, historical waste generation trends, and real-time bin fill levels while accounting for vehicle capacity constraints and environmental impact metrics.

title: Implementation of SAP ERP System
description: Seeking a certified SAP implementation partner to deploy SAP ERP modules for finance, procurement, and human resources. The project includes system customization, data migration, user training, and post-implementation support.

title: Supply of Medical Equipment for Regional Hospital
description: Invitation to supply advanced medical equipment including MRI machines, ultrasound devices, and patient monitoring systems. All equipment must meet EU medical device regulations and include training for hospital staff.

title: Entwicklung eines Online-Steuererklärungssystems
description: Suche nach Softwareentwicklungsfirmen für die Erstellung einer sicheren und benutzerfreundlichen Online-Plattform zur Steuererklärung. Das System sollte E-Signaturen unterstützen, Echtzeit-Validierungen ermöglichen und in bestehende staatliche Datenbanken integriert werden.

title: Straßensanierungs- und Wartungsdienste
description: Ausschreibung für die Sanierung von 100 km städtischer Straßen, einschließlich Belagsarbeiten, Reparaturen von Schlaglöchern sowie Wartung von Fahrbahnmarkierungen und Beschilderungen. Auftragnehmer müssen lokale Umwelt- und Sicherheitsvorschriften einhalten.

title: Upgrade des Ticketingsystems für den öffentlichen Nahverkehr
description: Suche nach Anbietern für das Upgrade des Ticketingsystems der Stadt für den öffentlichen Nahverkehr auf eine kontaktlose, kartenbasierte Lösung. Das Projekt umfasst die Lieferung von Hardware, Softwareentwicklung und Integration in die bestehende Infrastruktur.

title: Beschaffung von Softwarelizenzen für Bildungseinrichtungen
description: Einladung zur Lieferung von Softwarelizenzen für Bildungseinrichtungen im öffentlichen Sektor, die Fächer wie Mathematik, Naturwissenschaften und Sprachen abdecken. Die Software sollte mit Windows- und iOS-Plattformen kompatibel sein und technischen Support beinhalten.

title: Installation von energieeffizienter Straßenbeleuchtung
description: Suche nach Auftragnehmern für den Austausch der vorhandenen Straßenbeleuchtung durch energieeffiziente LED-Systeme. Das Projekt umfasst den Abbau alter Lampen, die Installation neuer Leuchten und eine Wartungsvereinbarung über drei Jahre.

title: Supply of Desktop Computers and Peripherals
description: Request for suppliers to provide desktop computers, monitors, keyboards, and mice for use in government offices. Equipment must meet specified technical requirements and include a minimum 3-year warranty.

title: Construction of Affordable Housing Units
description: Invitation to tender for the construction of 200 affordable housing units, including site preparation, building construction, and landscaping. The project aims to provide sustainable and energy-efficient homes.

title: Upgrade of Municipal Water Treatment Facility
description: Seeking engineering firms to design and implement upgrades to the municipal water treatment facility to meet new environmental standards. The project includes equipment installation and system optimization.

title: Procurement of Library Books and Materials
description: Request for suppliers to provide a range of books, e-books, and multimedia materials for public libraries. Materials should cover various genres and languages to meet community needs.

title: Development of Human Resources Management Software
description: Seeking a software development company to create a comprehensive HR management system, including modules for payroll, attendance tracking, performance evaluation, and employee self-service portals.

title: Supply of Laboratory Equipment for University
description: Invitation to supply advanced laboratory equipment for physics and chemistry departments, including spectrometers, centrifuges, and microscopes. Equipment must meet international calibration standards.

title: Renovation of Historic Museum Building
description: Tender for the restoration and renovation of a historic museum, including structural repairs, interior refurbishment, and installation of climate control systems to preserve artifacts.

title: Provision of Catering Services for Government Events
description: Request for professional catering companies to provide food and beverage services for official government events and meetings. Services should include menu planning, food preparation, and waitstaff.

title: Supply of Public Transport Buses
description: Invitation to supply 50 low-emission buses for the city's public transport fleet. Buses should meet Euro 6 emission standards and be equipped with accessibility features for disabled passengers.

title: Installation of Fire Safety Systems in Public Buildings
description: Seeking contractors to install advanced fire detection and suppression systems in various public buildings, including schools and community centers. Systems must comply with national fire safety regulations.

title: Maintenance of Public Parks and Green Spaces
description: Request for landscaping companies to provide maintenance services for public parks, including lawn care, tree pruning, and waste removal. Emphasis on sustainable practices and biodiversity conservation.

title: Supply of Police Uniforms and Equipment
description: Invitation to supply uniforms, protective gear, and equipment for the national police force. Items must meet specified quality standards and include options for both male and female officers.

title: Upgrade of Airport Baggage Handling System
description: Seeking suppliers to upgrade the airport's baggage handling system to improve efficiency and security. The project includes software and hardware installation, system integration, and staff training.

title: Provision of Waste Collection and Recycling Services
description: Invitation for service providers to manage waste collection, recycling, and disposal services for residential and commercial areas. Providers must comply with environmental regulations and promote waste reduction.

title: Development of E-Government Portal
description: Seeking IT firms to develop a comprehensive e-government portal to provide online access to public services, forms, and information. The platform should be secure, user-friendly, and support multiple languages.
buyer: Estonian Ministry of Economic Affairs and Communications

title: Construction of New Wastewater Treatment Plant
description: Invitation to tender for the construction of a new wastewater treatment facility to serve expanding urban areas. The project includes design, construction, and commissioning of the plant.

title: Supply of Electric Vehicles for Municipal Fleet
description: Seeking suppliers to provide 30 electric vehicles for use by various municipal departments. Vehicles should have a minimum range of 300 km and include charging equipment.

title: Provision of Legal Advisory Services
description: Request for law firms to provide legal advisory services on international trade agreements, compliance, and regulatory matters. Firms must have expertise in EU legislation and multilingual capabilities.

title: Supply and Maintenance of Vending Machines
description: Invitation to supply and maintain vending machines for snacks and beverages in government buildings. Machines should offer healthy options and support cashless payment methods.

title: Renovation of Urban Public Spaces
description: Seeking contractors for the renovation of public squares and pedestrian areas, including paving, installation of benches, lighting, and landscaping to enhance urban aesthetics.

title: Implementation of Customer Relationship Management System
description: Seeking implementation partners for a CRM system to improve citizen engagement and service delivery. The system should integrate with existing databases and support multi-channel communication.

title: Supply of Firefighting Equipment
description: Invitation to supply firefighting equipment including hoses, nozzles, protective clothing, and breathing apparatus. Equipment must meet international safety standards.

title: Development of Tourism Promotion Website
description: Seeking web development agencies to create an interactive website to promote local tourism. The site should feature multimedia content, booking integrations, and multilingual support.

title: Supply of Office Supplies and Stationery
description: Request for suppliers to provide office supplies including paper, pens, toner cartridges, and other stationery items for government departments on a contractual basis.

title: Upgrade of Public Wi-Fi Infrastructure
description: Seeking IT service providers to enhance the public Wi-Fi network across city centers and public spaces. The project includes hardware upgrades, security enhancements, and network optimization.

title: Provision of Translation and Interpretation Services
description: Request for professional translation and interpretation services to support government agencies in multilingual communication. Services required in at least 10 languages, including sign language interpretation.

title: Supply of Laboratory Chemicals and Reagents
description: Invitation to supply a wide range of laboratory chemicals and reagents for use in research institutions. Products must meet purity standards and include safety data sheets.

title: Installation of CCTV Surveillance Systems
description: Seeking contractors to install CCTV cameras and monitoring systems in public areas to enhance security. The project includes maintenance services and must comply with privacy regulations.

title: Provision of Public Relations and Marketing Services
description: Request for agencies to provide PR and marketing services to promote government initiatives and public awareness campaigns. Services include strategy development, content creation, and media relations.

title: Construction of Bicycle Lanes and Infrastructure
description: Seeking contractors to construct new bicycle lanes and related infrastructure to promote sustainable transport. The project includes signage, road markings, and safety barriers.

title: Supply of Educational Furniture for Schools
description: Invitation to supply desks, chairs, whiteboards, and storage units for newly built schools. Furniture must be durable, ergonomic, and suitable for various age groups.

title: Implementation of Document Management System
description: Seeking IT firms to implement an electronic document management system to improve record-keeping and workflow efficiency. The system should support document scanning, indexing, and retrieval.

title: Supply and Installation of Gym Equipment
description: Invitation to supply and install gym equipment for public fitness centers, including treadmills, weight machines, and exercise bikes. Equipment must meet safety standards and include warranties.

title: Development of Environmental Monitoring Software
description: Seeking software developers to create a platform for monitoring environmental data such as air quality, noise levels, and water pollution. The system should support data visualization and public access.

title: Provision of Training Services for Unemployed Individuals
description: Request for educational institutions to provide vocational training programs to unemployed individuals to enhance employability in sectors such as IT, healthcare, and construction.

title: Supply of Fresh Produce for School Meal Programs
description: Invitation to supply fresh fruits, vegetables, and dairy products for school meal programs. Suppliers must adhere to food safety standards and provide products sourced from sustainable agriculture.

title: Installation of Renewable Energy Systems in Public Housing
description: Seeking contractors to install solar panels and small wind turbines in public housing units to reduce energy costs and promote sustainability. Includes maintenance services for 5 years.

title: Upgrade of Hospital Information Systems
description: Seeking IT service providers to upgrade the hospital's information systems, including electronic health records, appointment scheduling, and billing systems. Must ensure data security and compliance with health regulations.

title: Provision of Public Transportation Services
description: Invitation for operators to provide bus transportation services on designated routes, including fleet maintenance and adherence to service schedules. Emphasis on low-emission vehicles.

title: Supply of Office Furniture for New Government Complex
description: Invitation to supply office furniture including desks, chairs, conference tables, and storage units for a new government complex. Furniture must be ergonomic and made from sustainable materials.

title: Development of Mobile Application for Citizen Services
description: Seeking mobile app developers to create an application that allows citizens to access government services, report issues, and receive notifications. The app should be available on iOS and Android platforms.

title: Provision of Cloud Hosting Services
description: Seeking cloud service providers to host government applications and data with high availability and security. Services should comply with data protection regulations and offer scalability options.

title: Construction of New Elementary School Building
description: Invitation to tender for the construction of a new elementary school, including classrooms, laboratories, sports facilities, and playgrounds. The design should prioritize safety and modern educational needs.

title: Supply of Vaccines for National Immunization Program
description: Invitation to supply various vaccines for the national immunization program, including influenza, measles, and polio vaccines. Suppliers must have WHO prequalification and comply with cold chain requirements.

title: Provision of Cybersecurity Assessment Services
description: Request for cybersecurity firms to conduct vulnerability assessments and penetration testing on government IT systems. Firms must provide detailed reports and remediation recommendations.

title: Implementation of Enterprise Resource Planning System
description: Seeking implementation partners for an ERP system covering finance, procurement, inventory management, and HR modules. The project includes customization, data migration, training, and support.

title: Supply of Road Maintenance Vehicles
description: Invitation to supply specialized vehicles for road maintenance, including snowplows, street sweepers, and asphalt repair units. Vehicles must meet emission standards and include operator training.

title: Installation of Traffic Signal Systems
description: Seeking contractors to install and upgrade traffic signal systems at various intersections to improve traffic flow and safety. Includes integration with central traffic management systems.

title: Provision of Psychological Counseling Services
description: Request for qualified professionals to provide psychological counseling services to students in public schools. Services include individual and group sessions, workshops, and crisis intervention.

title: Supply of Aviation Fuel for Government Aircraft
description: Invitation to supply aviation fuel (Jet A-1) for government-operated aircraft. Suppliers must comply with international fuel quality standards and provide fuel at multiple locations.

title: Maschinelles Lernmodell für Energieverbrauchsprognosen
description: Ausschreibung für die Entwicklung eines hochkomplexen Energieprognosemodells basierend auf einer Hybrid-Architektur aus rekurrenten neuronalen Netzen und probabilistischen Graphenmodellen. Integration von multimodalen Sensordaten, Wettervorhersagen und sozioökonomischen Indikatoren für granulare Verbrauchsvorhersagen auf Quartiersebene erforderlich.

title: Natursprachverarbeitung für Dokumentendigitalisierung
description: Entwicklung eines KI-gestützten Dokumentenverarbeitungssystems mit adaptiven OCR-Algorithmen und selbstlernenden Sprachmodellen zur kontextabhängigen Interpretation historischer Handschriften. Integration von Transformator-Architekturen für mehrsprachige Dokumentenanalyse und automatisierte Metadatenextraktion unter Berücksichtigung epoch-spezifischer Sprachvariationen.

title: Predictive Analytics Solution for Healthcare Analysis
description: Development of a sophisticated healthcare analytics platform incorporating quantum-inspired optimization algorithms, federated learning approaches, and automated feature engineering pipelines. System must demonstrate capability for multi-modal medical data fusion, handling of missing data through advanced imputation techniques, and real-time risk stratification using ensemble methods of gradient-boosted decision trees and deep neural networks.

title: Development of Online Learning Platform
description: Seeking developers to create an online learning platform for distance education. The platform should support video lectures, interactive assessments, and collaboration tools.

title: Renovation of Public Swimming Pools
description: Seeking contractors to renovate public swimming pools, including structural repairs, filtration system upgrades, and accessibility improvements. Compliance with health and safety regulations is mandatory.

title: Supply of Agricultural Machinery for Research Institute
description: Invitation to supply tractors, harvesters, and planting equipment for agricultural research purposes. Equipment should be compatible with precision farming technologies.

title: Provision of Data Analysis Services
description: Seeking firms to provide data analysis and statistical services for government research projects. Expertise required in handling large datasets, data visualization, and reporting.

title: Supply of Water Treatment Chemicals
description: Invitation to supply chemicals for water treatment plants, including coagulants, disinfectants, and pH adjusters. Suppliers must provide safety data sheets and comply with environmental regulations.

title: Implementation of Time and Attendance System
description: Seeking suppliers to implement an electronic time and attendance system for government employees, including biometric devices, software, and integration with HR systems.

title: Provision of Technical Support Services
description: Request for IT firms to provide technical support and helpdesk services for government departments, including hardware troubleshooting, software assistance, and user training.

title: Construction of Waste Recycling Facility
description: Invitation to construct a modern waste recycling facility capable of processing various types of waste materials. The project includes design, construction, and commissioning phases.

title: Supply of Medical Consumables for Hospitals
description: Invitation to supply medical consumables such as syringes, gloves, bandages, and antiseptics. Products must be CE certified and meet healthcare standards.

title: Construction of New Municipal Sports Complex
description: Invitation to tender for the construction of a modern sports complex, including swimming pools, gymnasiums, and outdoor athletic fields. The project requires adherence to sustainable building practices and accessibility standards.

title: Supply of Passenger Trains for Regional Rail Network
description: Seeking suppliers to provide 10 electric multiple-unit passenger trains for the regional rail network. Trains must meet EU safety and environmental standards and include maintenance support.

title: Implementation of Electronic Voting System
description: Seeking IT firms to develop and implement a secure electronic voting system for municipal elections. The system must ensure voter anonymity, data integrity, and be resistant to cyber-attacks.

title: Supply of Classroom Equipment for Vocational Schools
description: Invitation to supply specialized equipment for vocational schools, including welding machines, automotive diagnostic tools, and carpentry equipment. Suppliers must provide training materials and safety certifications.

title: Renovation of Historical Bridge
description: Tender for the restoration and structural reinforcement of a historical bridge. The project requires expertise in preservation techniques and compliance with heritage conservation regulations.

title: Provision of Nursing Services for Elderly Care Homes
description: Request for healthcare service providers to supply qualified nursing staff for public elderly care homes. Services include medical care, daily assistance, and emergency response.

title: Supply and Installation of HVAC Systems
description: Seeking contractors to supply and install energy-efficient heating, ventilation, and air conditioning systems in government buildings. Includes maintenance services for 5 years.

title: Implementation of Financial Management Software
description: Seeking software providers to implement a financial management system for municipal budgeting, accounting, and reporting. The system should support multi-user access and comply with accounting standards.

title: Supply of Library Management System
description: Invitation to provide a library management software solution, including cataloging, circulation, and digital resource integration. System must be user-friendly and support data migration from existing platforms.

title: Construction of Waste Incineration Plant
description: Seeking contractors to build a waste incineration facility with energy recovery capabilities. The project includes design, construction, and commissioning, adhering to environmental regulations.

title: Provision of Public Lighting Maintenance Services
description: Request for service providers to maintain and repair public lighting systems, including streetlights and traffic signals. Services include regular inspections, emergency repairs, and energy efficiency upgrades.

title: Supply of Office Automation Equipment
description: Invitation to supply photocopiers, scanners, and multifunction printers for government offices. Equipment must include network connectivity, secure printing features, and come with maintenance agreements.

title: Installation of Underground Fiber Optic Network
description: Seeking contractors to install underground fiber optic cables to enhance broadband connectivity in rural areas. The project includes trenching, cable laying, and network testing.

title: Supply of Waste Collection Vehicles
description: Invitation to supply 20 waste collection trucks equipped with compaction technology. Vehicles must meet emission standards and include operator training and maintenance services.

title: Provision of Security Services for Public Buildings
description: Request for security firms to provide guard services, surveillance, and access control for various public buildings. Staff must be licensed and trained in emergency response procedures.

title: Development of Traffic Management Software
description: Seeking software developers to create a traffic management system for monitoring and controlling traffic flow. The system should integrate with existing infrastructure and provide real-time analytics.

title: Supply of Hospital Beds and Medical Furniture
description: Invitation to supply adjustable hospital beds, bedside cabinets, and overbed tables. Products must meet medical safety standards and include warranties and maintenance support.

title: Implementation of Student Information System
description: Seeking software providers to implement a student information system for universities, including modules for admissions, enrollment, grades, and attendance. The system should support online access for students and staff.

title: Construction of Coastal Flood Defenses
description: Tender for the construction of sea walls and flood barriers to protect coastal areas from erosion and flooding. The project requires environmental impact assessments and sustainable engineering solutions.

title: Supply of Clean Energy Buses
description: Invitation to supply 40 hybrid or electric buses for the city's public transport fleet. Buses should have low-floor designs for accessibility and include charging infrastructure if electric.

title: Provision of Catering Services for Schools
description: Request for catering companies to provide healthy and balanced meals for public school cafeterias. Menus must comply with nutritional guidelines and cater to dietary restrictions.
